Phases.name: Design
Phases.description: Before we can develop a new application, or build new features for an existing application, we must first design and prototype what will be built.

Phases.name: Develop
Phases.description: This is our development playbook. It outlines our methodical, scientific approach to building iOS, Android, and web apps. It's a reflection of all the things we've learned on over our projects.

Phases.name: Maintain
Phases.description: Once the application goes live we can provide ongoing support via a maintenance agreement and/or ongoing active development agreements.
